channel.title: The Shake & Bake Show
channel.description:
Welcome to The Shake & Bake Show — your front-row seat to the wild, unfiltered world of drag racing! Hosted by Stevie “Fast” Jackson, Lyle Barnett, and Courtney Enders, this biweekly rollercoaster brings you the latest news, hot takes, and behind-the-scenes chaos from the sport we live and breathe. We serve up top-tier guests, outrageous stories, and insights from some of the sharpest (and funniest) minds in drag racing.
Catch us LIVE every other Tuesday at 6:30 PM Central / 7:30 PM Eastern on @SteveJacksonRacing’s YouTube channel.
Don’t forget to follow us on social media for updates, clips, and polls—so you can help steer the madness! IG: @theshakeandbakers FB: The Shake & Bake Show
channel.itunes:author: Steve Jackson, Lyle Barnett, and Courtney Enders

item.title: Ep 01 - The Pilot: Talk to Me, Goose!
item.description:
The one that started it all! The very first episode of Shake and Bake.
You can watch The S&B Show LIVE 6:30 CT/7:30 ET every other Tuesday on Steve Jackson Racing's YouTube channel. Follow us on socials to keep up with the circus, participate in polls, and see highlights from the show. FB: The Shake & Bake Show IG: @theshakeandbakers
